tool_description: Monitors and tracks survey responses across all distribution channels in real-time, providing detailed response status and completion metrics.

survey_id.description: Unique identifier for the survey to track

include_partial_responses.description: Whether to include partially completed responses

error_messages: Invalid survey_id: Survey ID must be a non-empty string.
Survey not found: The specified survey ID does not exist.
Invalid tracking_interval: Must be between 5 and 1440 minutes.
Tracking service unavailable: Response tracking service is currently unavailable.
usage: Provide survey_id to track responses. Optionally set tracking_interval and include_partial_responses. Returns current response statistics and status updates.

response_rate.description: Current response rate as a percentage

last_response_time.description: Timestamp of the most recent response
